alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 12:43PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sierra County through 115 PM MDT... At 1243 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Hermosa, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Miguel, Hermosa, Palomas, Ladder Ranch, Upper Palomas Canyon, and Lower Palomas Canyon. This includes Interstate 25 in New Mexico near mile marker 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
